name: generate_suno_prompt
description: Generate a Suno 4.5 music prompt for cinematic sleep & healing music, focused on piano and ambient rain sounds.

mood.description: Emotional tone of the track (e.g., peaceful, nostalgic, dreamy).

instruments.description: Main instruments (e.g., piano, ambient rain, soft strings).

duration_min.description: Duration of the track in minutes.

looping.description: Whether the prompt should generate a seamless loop.
